citations.narrative:
Item Housing Facilities General 3.1 a
At the time of inspection it was noticed that the viewing glass for the wolf - hybrid exhibit had 2 panes of glass that
were cracked and need to be repaired to maintain the exhibit structurally sound and in good repair
Facility needs to repair/replace glass viewing panels.
Correct by 10/15/2017

Item Facilities general 3.125 a
At the time of inspection the viewing windows for the red fox exhibits are cracked.
Facility needs to repair/replace the cracked panels in order to maintain them in good repair.
Correct by 10/15/2017
An exit interview took place at the end of inspection with the animal caretaker
